## Gene Details:

- **Gene Symbol:** <u>ATMGT4, MGT4, MRS2-3</u>
- **Gene Name:** ARABIDOPSIS THALIANA MAGNESIUM TRANSPORT 4, magnesium transporter 4
- **Description:**   magnesium transporter 4;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2091176
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
